mn111:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
mn111:3.1: Idha, bhikkhave, sariputto vivicceva kamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkam savicaram vivekajam pitisukham pathamam jhanam upasampajja viharati.
mn111:4.1: Ye ca pathame jhane dhamma vitakko ca vicaro ca piti ca sukhanca cittekaggata ca, phasso vedana sanna cetana cittam chando adhimokkho viriyam sati upekkha manasikaro—tyassa dhamma anupadavavatthita honti.
mn111:4.2: Tyassa dhamma vidita uppajjanti, vidita upatthahanti, vidita abbhattham gacchanti.
mn111:4.4: ‘evam kirame dhamma ahutva sambhonti, hutva pativenti’ti.
mn111:4.5: So tesu dhammesu anupayo anapayo anissito appatibaddho vippamutto visamyutto vimariyadikatena cetasa viharati.
mn111:5.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, sariputto vitakkavicaranam vupasama ajjhattam sampasadanam cetaso ekodibhavam avitakkam avicaram samadhijam pitisukham dutiyam jhanam upasampajja viharati.
mn111:6.1: Ye ca dutiye jhane dhamma—ajjhattam sampasado ca piti ca sukhanca cittekaggata ca, phasso vedana sanna cetana cittam chando adhimokkho viriyam sati upekkha manasikaro—tyassa dhamma anupadavavatthita honti.
mn111:6.2: Tyassa dhamma vidita uppajjanti, vidita upatthahanti, vidita abbhattham gacchanti.
mn111:6.4: ‘evam kirame dhamma ahutva sambhonti, hutva pativenti’ti.
mn111:6.5: So tesu dhammesu anupayo anapayo anissito appatibaddho vippamutto visamyutto vimariyadikatena cetasa viharati.
mn111:7.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, sariputto pitiya ca viraga upekkhako ca viharati sato ca sampajano, sukhanca kayena patisamvedeti. Yam tam ariya acikkhanti: ‘upekkhako satima sukhavihari’ti tatiyam jhanam upasampajja viharati.
mn111:8.1: Ye ca tatiye jhane dhamma—sukhanca sati ca sampajannanca cittekaggata ca, phasso vedana sanna cetana cittam chando adhimokkho viriyam sati upekkha manasikaro—
mn111:8.2: tyassa dhamma anupadavavatthita honti, tyassa dhamma vidita uppajjanti, vidita upatthahanti, vidita abbhattham gacchanti.
mn111:8.4: ‘evam kirame dhamma ahutva sambhonti, hutva pativenti’ti.
mn111:8.5: So tesu dhammesu anupayo anapayo anissito appatibaddho vippamutto visamyutto vimariyadikatena cetasa viharati.
mn111:9.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, sariputto sukhassa ca pahana dukkhassa ca pahana pubbeva somanassadomanassanam atthangama adukkhamasukham upekkhasatiparisuddhim catuttham jhanam upasampajja viharati.
mn111:10.1: Ye ca catutthe jhane dhamma—upekkha adukkhamasukha vedana passaddhatta cetaso anabhogo satiparisuddhi cittekaggata ca, phasso vedana sanna cetana cittam chando adhimokkho viriyam sati upekkha manasikaro—tyassa dhamma anupadavavatthita honti.
mn111:10.2: Tyassa dhamma vidita uppajjanti, vidita upatthahanti, vidita abbhattham gacchanti.
mn111:10.4: ‘evam kirame dhamma ahutva sambhonti, hutva pativenti’ti.
mn111:10.5: So tesu dhammesu anupayo anapayo anissito appatibaddho vippamutto visamyutto vimariyadikatena cetasa viharati.
mn111:11.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, sariputto sabbaso rupasannanam samatikkama patighasannanam atthangama nanattasannanam amanasikara ‘ananto akaso’ti akasanancayatanam upasampajja viharati.
mn111:12.1: Ye ca akasanancayatane dhamma—akasanancayatanasanna ca cittekaggata ca phasso vedana sanna cetana cittam chando adhimokkho viriyam sati upekkha manasikaro—tyassa dhamma anupadavavatthita honti.
mn111:12.2: Tyassa dhamma vidita uppajjanti, vidita upatthahanti, vidita abbhattham gacchanti.
mn111:12.4: ‘evam kirame dhamma ahutva sambhonti, hutva pativenti’ti.
mn111:12.5: So tesu dhammesu anupayo anapayo anissito appatibaddho vippamutto visamyutto vimariyadikatena cetasa viharati.
mn111:13.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, sariputto sabbaso akasanancayatanam samatikkamma ‘anantam vinnanan’ti vinnanancayatanam upasampajja viharati.
mn111:14.1: Ye ca vinnanancayatane dhamma—vinnanancayatanasanna ca cittekaggata ca, phasso vedana sanna cetana cittam chando adhimokkho viriyam sati upekkha manasikaro—tyassa dhamma anupadavavatthita honti.
mn111:14.2: Tyassa dhamma vidita uppajjanti, vidita upatthahanti, vidita abbhattham gacchanti.
mn111:14.4: ‘evam kirame dhamma ahutva sambhonti, hutva pativenti’ti.
mn111:14.5: So tesu dhammesu anupayo anapayo anissito appatibaddho vippamutto visamyutto vimariyadikatena cetasa viharati.
mn111:15.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, sariputto sabbaso vinnanancayatanam samatikkamma ‘natthi kinci’ti akincannayatanam upasampajja viharati.
mn111:16.1: Ye ca akincannayatane dhamma—akincannayatanasanna ca cittekaggata ca, phasso vedana sanna cetana cittam chando adhimokkho viriyam sati upekkha manasikaro—tyassa dhamma anupadavavatthita honti.
mn111:16.2: Tyassa dhamma vidita uppajjanti, vidita upatthahanti, vidita abbhattham gacchanti.
mn111:16.4: ‘evam kirame dhamma ahutva sambhonti, hutva pativenti’ti.
mn111:16.5: So tesu dhammesu anupayo anapayo anissito appatibaddho vippamutto visamyutto vimariyadikatena cetasa viharati.
mn111:17.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, sariputto sabbaso akincannayatanam samatikkamma nevasannanasannayatanam upasampajja viharati.
mn111:18.2: So taya samapattiya sato vutthahitva ye dhamma atita niruddha viparinata te dhamme samanupassati:
mn111:18.3: ‘evam kirame dhamma ahutva sambhonti, hutva pativenti’ti.
mn111:18.4: So tesu dhammesu anupayo anapayo anissito appatibaddho vippamutto visamyutto vimariyadikatena cetasa viharati.
mn111:19.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, sariputto sabbaso nevasannanasannayatanam samatikkamma sannavedayitanirodham upasampajja viharati. Pannaya cassa disva asava parikkhina honti.
mn111:20.2: So taya samapattiya sato vutthahitva ye dhamma atita niruddha viparinata te dhamme samanupassati:
mn111:20.3: ‘evam kirame dhamma ahutva sambhonti, hutva pativenti’ti.
mn111:20.4: So tesu dhammesu anupayo anapayo anissito appatibaddho vippamutto visamyutto vimariyadikatena cetasa viharati.
mn111:21.1: Yam kho tam, bhikkhave, samma vadamano vadeyya:
mn111:21.2: ‘vasippatto paramippatto ariyasmim silasmim, vasippatto paramippatto ariyasmim samadhismim, vasippatto paramippatto ariyaya pannaya, vasippatto paramippatto ariyaya vimuttiya’ti, sariputtameva tam samma vadamano vadeyya:
mn111:21.3: ‘vasippatto paramippatto ariyasmim silasmim, vasippatto paramippatto ariyasmim samadhismim, vasippatto paramippatto ariyaya pannaya, vasippatto paramippatto ariyaya vimuttiya’ti.
mn111:22.1: Yam kho tam, bhikkhave, samma vadamano vadeyya:
mn111:22.2: ‘bhagavato putto oraso mukhato jato dhammajo dhammanimmito dhammadayado no amisadayado’ti, sariputtameva tam samma vadamano vadeyya:
mn111:22.3: ‘bhagavato putto oraso mukhato jato dhammajo dhammanimmito dhammadayado no amisadayado’ti.
mn111:23.1: Sariputto, bhikkhave, tathagatena anuttaram dhammacakkam pavattitam sammadeva anuppavatteti”ti.
mn111:23.3: Attamana te bhikkhu bhagavato bhasitam abhinandunti.
